name: Color
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Properties
Color
description:
Color

Color information consisting of RGB channels, score, and fraction of image the color occupies in the image.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/logo.jpg"
properties = image.properties

color = properties.colors.first
color.red #=> 247.0
color.green #=> 236.0
color.blue #=> 20.0
color.rgb #=> "f7ec14"
color.alpha #=> 1.0
color.score #=> 0.20301803946495056
color.pixel_fraction #=> 0.007264957297593355

methods.name: alpha
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Properties
Color#alpha
methods.description: The amount this color that should be applied to the pixel. A value of 1.0 corresponds to a solid color, whereas a value of 0.0 corresponds to a completely transparent color.

methods.name: pixel_fraction
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Properties
Color#pixel_fraction
methods.description: Stores the fraction of pixels the color occupies in the image.
